modName: Ice Pond - Menu Music Replacer - Korean Instrumental only
summary:
I Just wanted to share something as the community has given me so much, although not impressive I made some menu replacer music for myself. And I thought I would share. I have plans for more..
--------Instrumental only-----------
descriptionHtml:
I Just wanted to share something as the community has given me so much, although not impressive I made some menu replacer music for myself. And I thought I would share.
This is an Instrumental only, and it fits the basic main menu picture nicely (my personal opinion)

The song <Ice Pond> is Korean, it has no words as stated above. So enjoy >:D
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=twEImwWgphM

- Fun facts!
1. If anyone DL/likes this I have some more I could upload as I think they would fit the replacer to (that and I\'m making myself a new one)

2. If people think I did an OKAY job I could add more asian style music in different forms, like battle and so on. I have replaced audio with varying success over the years on different things and for other games for example M&B series and oblivion(who didn\'t mod oblivions music? ha!)/etc

Other songs with/without words would be from:

the People\'s Republic of China,
Socialist Republic of Vietnam,
Korea, Republic of 
Democratic People\'s Republic of Korea,
MAYBE Japan/others

- I may take requests if you need me too -

Need help? Should work fine if you have a retail, up to date Skyrim. Pirates got hanged for a reason! :P (Any other questions ask me.)

If you want to use this for any reason why not :) (own mod etc fine) please don\'t upload this to steam.

<all songs have been edited, to a degree that you could at least upload them here-to Youtube or any other site without it breaking any content rules, though that isn\'t / won\'t be an issue. :)

Enjoy~
author: WonsuMonk
